arabic.title: Es Salamo Allaikoum (السلام عليكم)
text: إس إس السلام عليكم.. السلام عليكم
ده الحياة هلة يالله بنا يالله نحضن الأيام
أنا قلبي سلم يا حبيبي رد السلام
وافتحلي قلبك يا حبيبي وإنسى الخصام
حب و ارقص غني.. أوعى تبعد عني
هات أديك يالله ده السلام لله لأ كفاية عناد
اتضم شوقك على شوقي قرب يا واد
و حلّوي يا دنيا و روقي بعد البعاد
بين رموشك خدني.. أو تعالَ بحضني
ضحكة مع غمزة نظرة مع همسة كلو يبقى تمام
أنا بس عيزك تديني حبة حنان
و بأحلى حب تنسيني مر الزمان
لو غلطت عتبني مش تروح و تسبني
يالله يا وحشني عيش و عيشني ليه تبات زعلان

english.title: Es Salamo Allaikoum
text: ess ess peace on u all
after sayin peace (means hii) talking will be better
stay awake all the night along ..melting in love
life is beautiful so come on accept those days with hugs
my heart already saied "peace" so u should say it 2 now
and u shall open ur heart and forget about those fights
dance..sing .. dont u dare to get away from me
give me ur hands cause we'r talking about peace so its enough to be mad
get closer to my love come closer my baby
اتضم شوقك على شوقي قرب يا واد
and this beuatiful world must be better after all this distance we got through
between ur eyeshalls take me .. come closer to my cheast
smile with a wink.. thats what it takes
I just want u 2 give me some love and sweetness
and in this love I shall forget the bad times
even if we made mistakes ..dont go and leave me
come on u..live and let me live 2...dont stay sad

english.title: The crowning touch (the final goodness)
text: (you are) The one who raised the banner of Islam
To guide and enlighten god's creatures
(you are) The one who raised the banner of Islam
To guide and enlighten god's creatures
(you are) The most precious gift from god
(you are) The most precious gift from god
With all my feelings and heart
I love you, oh prophet of Allah
(you are) The seal3 of Prophethood and religions
(you are) The one with followed word4
The banner of Islam shall continue to wave
(you are) The seal of Prophethood and religions
(you are) The one with followed word
The banner of Islam shall continue to wave
(you are) The most precious gift from god
for every diseased, disease and ailment
(you are) The most precious gift from god
for every diseased, disease and ailment
(you are) The symbol of honour and manners
(you are) The most precious gift from god
(you are) The most precious gift from god
With all my feelings and heart
I love you, oh son of Abduallah

arabic.title: إفرض
text: حس بيا ده انت ليا كل حاجة
ليه بعندك ليه تضيع كل حاجة
ده انت برضه لو تعوزني هتلاقيني

english.title: Efred
text: why do you complain if you're the comet
efredh masalan masalan yani eni khasemtak yoom
ما انت تاعبني ومغلبني ومنسيني النوم
you're tiring ,defeating me and making me forget the sleep
my night got long in your absence
hes biya dant liya kol haga
ليه بعندك ليه تضيع كل حاجة
why do you make everything lost by your stubbornness
efredh masalan masalan yani eni khasemtak yoom
ما انت تاعبني ومغلبني ومنسيني النوم
you're tiring ,defeating me and making me forget the sleep
and the begrudger makes a story of nothing
mazed with you and got perplexed with me
and i know that you will make pass every word i say
efredh masalan masalan yani eni khasemtak yoom
ما انت تاعبني ومغلبني ومنسيني النوم
you're tiring ,defeating me and making me forget the sleep
tell me what's the end of my suffering
ده انت برضه لو تعوزني هتلاقيني
you'll find me too if you need me
efredh masalan masalan yani eni khasemtak yoom
ما انت تاعبني ومغلبني ومنسيني النوم
you're tiring ,defeating me and making me forget the sleep

arabic.title: إيه ده بقى
text: ايه ده بقي ايه ده بقي؟
ايه ده بقي ده بقي ده بقي ده؟
ماداري هو بالحب ده ايه ده
ده انا بس لو اشوف خيالو
وان شوفته لا بروح ولا اجي
ايه ده بقي ده بقي ده
وان شوفته لا بروح ولا اجي

english.title: What is this, now?
text: What is this, now? (What is this, now?)
What is this, now?  What is this? What is this, now?  What is this?
Is it reasonable for beauty like this to exist?
I'm covering my fire,  you think I am?
If I only see his (her) silhouette,
I'm taken aback by his (her) charm and softness.
Anybody, tall, short, young, or old would melt because of his (her) beauty and grace.
If I see him,  I don't go or come (I stay in my place).
And that's not in my hand (against my will).
Against my will,  he stole my mind. What did I have to do with longing before?
What is this, now? (What is this, now?)
What is this, now?  What is this? What is this, now?  What is this?
What is this? Is this magic or what?
And why his (her) eyes appear everywhere.
And if our eyes meet,  I find myself unable to find myself anymore.
And I'm taken aback by his (her) eyelashes.
And if he (she) was absent for seconds, I feel my existence jumble up, and I keep looking for him (her).
If I only see his (her) silhouette,
I'm taken aback by his (her) charm and softness.
Anybody, tall, short, young, or old would melt because of his (her) beauty and grace.
And if I see him,  I don't go or come (I stay in my place).
And that's not in my hand (against my will).
Against my will,  he stole my mind. What did I have to do with longing before?
What is this, now? (What is this, now?)
What is this, now?  What is this? What is this, now?  What is this?
With his (her) beauty, I melt, I adore (I'm in love).
But I hide (my love)  and say no,  no. And when I see him (her) coming, I don't know my night from my day.
He (she) has a bit of naughtiness,  that slowly make me melt.
And I see in his (her) eyes a bit of harshness (defiancy).
But also delicacy and beauty. And that's what I like about him (her).
If I only see his (her) silhouette,
I'm taken aback by his (her) charm and softness.
Anybody, tall, short, young, or old would melt because of his (her) beauty and grace.
And if I see him,  I don't go or come (I stay in my place).
And that's not in my hand (against my will).
Against my will,  he stole my mind. What did I have to do with longing before?
What is this, now? (What is this, now?)
What is this, now?  What is this? What is this, now?  What is this?

arabic.title: البعد لا
text: البعد لا لا والهجر لا لا
والتقل لا لا لا لا لا
لكن لحد كده لا لا لا لا

english.title: No to Separation
text: No to separation, no, and no to abandonment, no
And no to playing hard to get no no no no
The one I loved and the one who holds my soul
is by my side yet I don't find her
despite the fact that I want her and think about her
But enough is enough, no no no no
She kept my hopes high with love
and deprives me of her tenderness
And I write her, she exposes me
And I become scared to tell her lest she be unfair on me
Tell her to be a little more merciful upon me
And let her love fear for me
I drew her image in my eyes
while she does not feel me

english.title: Le le le le
text: and no no to not seeing each other
the one i love and who has my heart
even when she is with me i cant find her (she ignores him)
even thu i love her and think of her
but she prohebited me from her love (didnt love me back)
and when i tell her why (why is she doing this) she gets angry
and im scared she will be unfair to me
i will tell her i will tell her i have to tell her!
tell her to have pitty on me
people tell her to have just a little pitty on me
her picture is always in my eyes
but she doesnt feel for me
i will tell her i will tell her i have to tell her!
the one i love and who has my heart
even when she is with me i cant find her (she ignores him)
even thu i love her and think of her

arabic.title: الحق عليه
text: اه يا واد يا حتة مني ايه آخرة البعاد
من عطفك ليه حارمني ومزود فى العناد؟
كان عامل إنه بيهواني قال وانا صدقته
كان إيه عالمر اللي رماني خلاني عشقته
علمتهه يحب ويتكلم أتاريه مش ليا
علمته وأول ما اتعلم بقى يجرح فيااا

english.title: it's his fault
text: el haq aleih / it's his/her fault
he's the one who cant be trusted
he's the one who betrayed me
he's the ones who hurt my heart
he's the one who kan be trusted
it's his fault, it's his fault
he acted like he loved me and i believed him
what was wrong with me that made love him
and how could i forget him and im in love with him
and never a day, did he please me.
its his fault, its his fault
i taught him how to love and how to talk (flirt), not knowing he wont be mine
i taught him before he had learned, only to come back and hurt me
and my beloved, cant even notice (feel) why so (why am i hurt)
wel haq aleih... its is fault
he took my heart and left me
i comforted him, he tired me
he's the one who cant be trusted
he's the one who betrayed me

english.title: Tonight is his Night
text: And I've said all I have
May God bless us with a similar luck
Flipped our existence on its head
Where is he taking us with his charm?
No matter how much I tell tales, say,
or no matter how long I describe..
And his handsomeness is of the country-side
And the country-side can feed one's appetites
Well, if by countryside you mean low class, then sure
We are not of different opinions
I say the truth even if it harms me
no matter who is there to witness it
But now the worst has happened1
And look at the person that we are now stuck with
No one ever saw beauty like his,
Not a human nor a jinn
As beautiful as the full moon, I swear it!
Donia: God will judge you for this oath!
And I've said all I have
May God bless us with a similar luck
Flipped our existence on its head
And the words are a song
And there is no one like that in the world
Everyone that took a glance at him
and couldn't sleep, not even for a second
Well, he surely must stay up and not sleep
This is of course because of fear
Is it possible for anyone to see this sight
and be able to sleep one night?!
He's as beautiful as the moon of course, even if you don't like it
Let this day pass in peace
We are kidding about, we don't mean anyone
We are joking with you out of happiness
Donia: No, I am being serious for real!
And I've said all I have
May God bless us with a similar luck
Flipped our existence on its head
Where is he taking us with his charm?

english.title: Bashaka
text: Ok ,My wish to  pamper me once
Pamper  me once you win my love
Pamper me even for this time
Enough to  resist  that increases my stubbornness
My darling upset has a different shape
I go to reconcile with her ,she feel relaxed at once
Love, love her ... not any love
I feel she was created for me
Ok ,My wish to  pamper me once

english.title: The sweetness of spirit
text: Oh you who adore beauty, beauty is sweetness of the soul
There are those who are very beautiful, but barely alive
And what good is beauty if you live with it in pain and agony
Don’t let it make you arrogant or deceive you
Because if it does, it will make your nights a living hell
No matter what, beauty will fade away tomorrow
No matter what, beauty will fade away tomorrow
What lasts is the beauty of the soul
What really bothers and pain me
Is that I gave them everything and they got rid of me
And then you’ll know the true of me
I’m swimming and the waves are high
The waves are high for me
It throws me up and bangs me down
And was always caring for them
I won’t care for them anymore
There are those who find grace lying on the ground
And other kind of people would gather grace from the ground
And those who’s disgrace helpless women
And those who’s disgrace helpless women
In this world he’d be disgraced
This world has insulted lots of good people
Prince Prince Replay it Again, Again, Again

arabic.title: عم سلامة
text: و ليه الغلابة اه واكلاها الديابة
و لا حد فاهم ولا عارف
و لا حد لاقي لنفسه مكان

english.title: Aam Salama
text: Uncle Salama, Where have safety,love and compassion gone ?
and why are poor people eaten by wolves ?
why is there so much cruelty in the world ?
No safe road for us to walk in
and the poor one is always humiliated
people have no time to just greet each other
No one understands what's going on
and hardly find a place to yourself
Is judgement day so close ? [is it the end of the world?]
The day and the night are alike
and the heart is full of sorrows
and the boring days pass slowly
and the humans are like beasts
Is it the end of the world ?
Some people bad mouthed the others
Is it the end of the world ?!

english.title: Amm Salama
text: and why are the poor, oh, being eaten by wolves?
There isn't a path we can walk
nor a tear we can hide
We are living in dark days
And the poor is always degraded
Even greetings are all done standing2
Left and right everyone is deviating from [morals/the law..etc]
nor can anyone find a place for himself
Tell me what is going on
People speak ill about each other [in their absence]
There are so many unfair people
People gloat [over others' hardships] and they hold grudges
People covet the livelihood of each other3
There are so many treacherous people
Tell me what is going on
In the days we have seen suffering
And mornings became the same as nights
till it made us fed up
and the heart is full of sadness
The taste of food became bitter
and the days refuse to pass
There's less goodness and more evil [in the world] now
Tell me what is going on
Tell me what is going on
People speak ill about each other [in their absence]
There are so many unfair people
People gloat [over other's hardships] and they hold grudges
People covet the livelihood of each other3
There are so many treacherous people
Tell me what is going on

arabic.title: عملنا اللي علينا
text: عملنا اللي علينا علينا والباقي على الله
محبه واخلاص ادينا ولا قصرنا معاه
كبر الوله على ادينا وغره الزمان
نسي حبنا وليالينا وشوقنا اللي كان
مبقاش يفوت ليله من غير خصام
احنا الي طمعناه فينا وقصر الكلام
عملنا اللي علينا علينا والباقي على الله
محبه واخلاص ادينا ولا قصرنا معاه
يضحك لنا نقول عايز محبه وخيال
لأ مش حنضعف يوم تاني قدام عينيه
عملنا اللي علينا علينا والباقي على الله
محبه واخلاص ادينا ولا قصرنا معاه

english.title: Done all I had to
text: she hurt me and then she cried and went on complaining
and she's sold our love with sadness and crying
came to take and found nothing
we made amends and then blamed one another
I made compromises and she didn't like it
Done all I had to and the rest is in God's hands
gave her love and loyalty, gave her everything
all of this happened because I spoiled you
and made you take my heart for granted
you made me cry, you hurt me
she grew over me and let life take her away
she forgot about our love, nights and our longings of the past
now she doesn't let a night pass by without a fight
grief, and nights of desertion and blame
I made her take me for granted, there's nothing left to say
Done all I had to and the rest is in God's hands
gave her love and loyalty, gave her everything
she laughs to me, I say it's love and illusion
she shuns me away, I say maybe she's playing hard to get
and because she meant so much to me, I put with her
and because I kept my silence, I became a toy in her hands
no, I won't be weak another day before her eyes
Done all I had to and the rest is in God's hands
gave her love and loyalty, gave her everything

arabic.title: قال بيحبني
text: لو كنت بتحبني ما كنت تجرحني
لا ملامة لا ملامة على على قلبك
لا تلومني تاني تاني ولا ولا أعاتبك

english.title: She Loves Me
text: If you loved me, you would not hurt me
If you cherish me  , you should  comfort me
The girl who has a bold eyelash
Treacherous and pretended to be innocent
Oh the hardness of your heart
And if It was on your love
No blame, no blame on your heart
Do not blame me again, nor blame you
Do you want me to go back to you ?
You will tell me this is your heart

arabic.title: كلام بكلام
text: دانا كل دمعه بالف دمعه هردها
انا زى مانت كسرت قلبى انا هكسرك
لو حتى هخسر فيك هبيعك واخسرك

english.title: Kalam Be kalam
text: No need for too much talking
Who’s telling whom that its unfair !!
All that you are doing ,is reducing me
And I’m living for you and you are killing me
And I’m strengthening you and you are closing me
As if you sweared to make me lose
Word to word we will talk
It’s over ,your student has been learned
Bravo its great too much my teacher
You knew how to breed and how to teach
Yes I hated you and forgot you
And your breeding was useful for me
You had been gave me a big lesson on insult
And I studied it well and I insulted you
Who’s telling whom that its unfair !!
For the sake of my tears and my heart’s wound ,I should show you
That your student has been learned and intend to ennoble you
And I will step on you
And I will sell the companionship
I should retake each tear of me by 1000 tears of you
And everything I had been built it ,I swear to destroy it
And I was between your hands
I will break you like how you broken up my heart
Even if I’m gonna lose you ,I will sell out you and make you lose
And I will sell out your love
And I will take off my revenge

arabic.title: كلة يرقص
text: طير بينا يا قلبي يالا عالحب وعالغرام
نحضن ايامنا يالا ننسى الآه والخصام
[طير بينا يا قلبي يالا عالحب وعالغرام]
نحضن ايامنا يالا ننسى الآه والخصام
هم اللي قبل منا من الدنيا اخدوا ايه

english.title: All dance!
text: [Enjoy and forget about the worry, dude]
Let them say whatever they want to say
Come on, leave it to god
Fly us to the love and passion, my heart
To embrace our days and forget the aches and disputes
[Fly us to the love and passion, my heart]
To embrace our days and forget the aches and disputes
Why are you afraid of tomorrow
What is to be afraid for
Why are you afraid of tomorrow
What is to be afraid for
What did those who came before get out of this life
And we stayed up the nights
All things come to him who waits
All things come to him who waits
Leave it to the one in the heavens3
Forget about all Illusions and sober up
Leave it to the one in the heavens
Forget about all Illusions and sober up
It is going to get better and better
Savour the tang of joy, Taste it!
And we stayed up the nights

arabic.title: من أول مرة شفته
text: من اول مره شفته وانا هتجنن واشوفه تاني
آه ياني من حلاوته ومن شقاوته يااااااااااااااااني
هو ده اللي رموش عيونه حببتني فيه
والغرام اللي في عيونه خدني مني ليه
ده اللي قاعد جوه قلبي ومسيطر عليه
ده اللي رافع معنوياّ قلبي في الحياة
ده اللي بنظرة منه خلي عقلي مني تاه
لو راح شرق غرب شمال جنوب هروح وراه
مش هسيبه يسيبني ثانية ولا حتى نص
هوه ده اللي بعده عني بيجيبلي اكتئاب
قلبي قافل منّي جدّاً من ساعة ما غاب
أصلي وقعت فيه وقلبي من غرامه داب
قلبي أقلم نفسه إنّه ما يعش إلا بيه
ده اللي كل مرّة اشوفه بيجيلي انتعاش
أيوه مت فيه وهو جوه في قلبي عاش
هستناه العمر كلّه حتى لو ما جاش
يعتبر شرف لقلبي إنّي عشت ليه

english.title: Since the first time I saw her
text: Since the first time I saw her, I've been dying to see her again
How beautiful she is! Oh, How naughty!
When I try to take her out of my mind
I try to remove her from my heart
But she distracts me with her eyelashes
(Wherever I take my sight.) to left or to right
I see her in front of me
I get up and wash my face,
She is the one, whose eyelashes made me fell in love
The passion in her love totally dominated me1
She is the one, settling inside my heart and taking control
I, spiritually, feel relief just by seeing her.
She is the one that raises the morale of my heart.
She is the one that drives me insane with a single glance
Wherever she will go, I will follow2
I will never leave her not for a second, not even for a half-second.
When I try to take her out of my mind
I try to remove her from my heart
But she distracts me with her eyelashes
She is the one, away from whom I fell in depression.
My heart is turning me the cold shoulder since she has gone.
I've fell in her love and this love melted my heart.
My heart adapted itself to live only with her.
She is is one, who revives me when I see.
Yes, I loved her to death. Yes, she lived in my heart.
I will wait for her my whole life. And even if she didn't come,
It would be considered an honor to my heart that I lived for her sake.
When I try to take her out of my mind
I try to remove her from my heart
But she distracts me with her eyelashes
(Wherever I take my sight.) to left or to right
I see her in front of me
I get up and wash my face
May it be a good dream!

arabic.title: نار
text: ياللي حبيبك قاسي وسابك وياعذابك آه
إنسي عذابك من أحبابك وأفتح بابك
وفي ليله ويوم نساني النوم وبقيت محروم
بكاني ولا جاني تاه منه عنواني
لا بعت سلام ولاأي كلام سهرنا ونام

english.title: Nar
text: oh the one left by his cruel beloved in your torment
forget your torment from your beloved ones and open your door
my heart is set on fire
and my beloved is leaving me on fire
and my mind is already confused
it's my destiny that i live in fire
i loved him so much and i neede him but didn't find him
he left my heart on fire
i cured him and called him ,he forgot me but i didn't
he made me forget the sleep and i became deprived in one night and day
he made me cry and didn't show up for me ,he lost my adress
nor he greeted or said something ,he made us awake ans he slept

arabic.title: هوا ده
text: أهو ده اللى جماله فى عينى
من يوم ما قابلنى هو ده
هو ده نسانى الدنيا هو ده هو ده
ولا غاب عن بالى هو ده
من يوم ما نادانى هو ده
فى ثانية لأ هو ده هو ده
شفت الحنية فى سحر عينيه ايه ايه ايه
أهو ده اللى كان نفسى أوده
أول ما شوفته بعينى وقلبه نادانى
رجعلى تانى سنينى معاه فى ثوانى
اللى فى هواه علمنى ازاى أتهنى
ومعاه بحس كأنى بعيش فى الجنة
وفى قربه لو هيعدى زمانى وماله
ده الثانيه جنبه تقضى العمر بحاله
خلانى أحلم بيه وايديه فى ايديا

english.title: this is the one
text: This is the one who I care about
And my eyes go with him
This is the one by 2 words with a look from his eyes affected me
This is the one whose beauty equals the treasures of this world
Who I like is this one
Whose lashes affect me is this one
I loved him and he loved me
And I found him inside my heart
I've seen him and he drove me crazy
This is the one who made me forget about the world
And he has never been away of my mind
Since the day he called me in
This is the one who I loved in a second
I've seen the gentleness and the charm in his eyes
This is the one who I wished to love
And to kiss 100 kisses on his cheek
Once I've seen him with my eyes and my heart called me
My years returned back to me in seconds
he is my lover and I have no one but him
And I love everything in him
In his love, he taught me how to get pleased
And with him I feel like I live in the heaven
what is that? what is that?
Who is pretty as much as him?
my sweetheart is beautiful and soft
And beside him if I'd pass all my life I don't care
As the second beside him equals the whole life
There is no one like him in his gentleness
he made me dream about him and his hands were in my hands
However I described him it won't be enough.

english.title: Not Even One
text: It took me back and forth
And if i saw her shadow,
Not even one, not a hundred
Not even a thousand and three hundred
She is the one who is my heart's love
And the one that resides deep within my heart
And there is no-one but her,
For many times, they spoke about her
They were jealous of her eyes' charm
Say what you may about her
She will always be my soul
She took my heart, oh man
Not even one, not a hundred
Not even a thousand and three hundred
She is the one who is my heart's love
And the one that resides deep within my heart
And there is no-one but her,
Let my heart stay with her
My passion melts in her love
Oh my, how beautiful is she, wow!
Let us finally be happy and live
She's the only one I have
And no one would ever content me
Not even one, not a hundred
Not even a thousand and three hundred
She is the one who is my heart's love
And the one that resides deep within my heart
And there is no-one but her,
not even in a hundred million [others]

arabic.title: يا خسارتك يا قلبي
text: يا خسارتك ياقلبي في الجرح والقسا
يا خسارة حناني والحب اللي اتنسى
يا خسارة شوقنا يا قلبي والعمر اللي رااااح
ياخسارة شوقنا يا قلبي والعمر اللي رااااح
ياخسارة شوقنا يا قلبي والعمر اللي راااااح
ياخسارة شوقنا يا قلبي والعمر اللي رااااح

english.title: A pity, my heart
text: [for the wailing and cruelty you endured]
Love them you did, my heart
A pity for the wounds and cruelty you endured, my heart
A pity for my kindness and love that was forgotten
[A pity for the wounds and cruelty you endured, my heart]
[A pity for my kindness and love that was forgotten]
Those1 with whom we went and came2
We made them laugh, they laughed at us4
[Those with whom we went and came]
[We made them laugh, they laughed at us]
A pity for our kindness and years that passed, my heart
[A pity for the wounds and cruelty you endured, my heart]
[A pity for my kindness and love that was forgotten]
[A pity for the wounds and cruelty you endured, my heart]
[A pity for my kindness and love that was forgotten]
We sowed love and reaped wounds
And here is the bitter thing
Bitterness took all our passions away
We sowed love and reaped wounds
And here is the bitter thing
Bitterness took all our passions away
And when the loved ones are the ones causing the wounds
Who would heal us, my heart
And when the loved ones are the ones causing the wounds
Who would heal us, my heart
A pity for our passion and years that passed, my heart
[A pity for the wounds and cruelty you endured, my heart]
[A pity for my kindness and love that was forgotten]
[A pity for the wounds and cruelty you endured, my heart]
[A pity for my kindness and love that was forgotten]
That's our story with the loved ones
This is the result: tears and torment
That's our story with the loved ones
This is the result: tears and torment
They leave us crying and in agony
I wish we were learning, my heart
They leave us crying and in agony
I wish we were learning, my heart
A pity for our passion and years that passed, my heart
[A pity for the wounds and cruelty you endured, my heart]
[A pity for my kindness and love that was forgotten]
[A pity for the wounds and cruelty you endured, my heart]
[A pity for my kindness and love that was forgotten]
Those with whom we went and came
We made them laugh, they laughed at us
[Those with whom we went and came]
[We made them laugh, they laughed at us]
A pity for our passion and years that passed, my heart

arabic.title: يا ساتر يا ستار
text: يا ساتر ياستار ياساتر يا ستار
آه من صوته آه من سكاته
يا ساتر ياساتر يا ساتر ياستار
أول ما بشوفوا من كسوفه يدارى أوام
مع أن عيونه أه عيونه مليانه كلام
ده بيجرى فى دمى وفى وريدى
يا ساتر ياساتر يا ساتر ياستار
آه يانارى يانارى آه يانارى من سحر عنيه
ده أن بعده ثوانى يانى يانى مقدرش عليه
يا ساتر ياساتر يا ساتر ياستار

english.title: Ya Sater Ya Sattar
text: oh my god (sattar is one of gods' names)
oh his voice, oh his silence
once i see him ,he hide because of his shyness
how lovely (allah is god ,but we say allah when we like something)
although his eyes r full of words
u want me to leave him, i can't
he is running (he means his love) in my blood in my vein
oh the sharm in his eyes he sets me in fire
i can't stand his absence even if for seconds
whatever happened to me because of my sweetheart

arabic.title: يا مزاجه
text: وانا ببقي معاه على قد هواه

english.title: Her Mood
text: Oh [how awesome is her] mood when she's chill
And good God.. When she's upset...
She parties and makes me party with her
And I remain silent because I need her
And I stay with her for as much as I love her
And we talk and sing chants
And she cheers up.. and cheers me up
And if I got lost, she wakes me up
And sometimes I lie and she believes
since I have found out the cure for her1
Oh how awesome is her mood when she's chill
And good God.. When she's upset...
And I do not taste sleep
And sometimes she drives me crazy
And her words occupy my mind
I am afraid of embarrassing her
Oh [how awesome is] her mood when she's chill
And good God.. When she's upset...
She parties and makes me party with her
And I remain silent because I need her

english.title: How wild she gets!
text: How wild she gets... how wild she gets
How wild she gets when she's stoked... and God have mercy on us all when she's pissed off
She forgets herself and makes me forget myself...she dances and makes me dance
And sometimes she goes insane and kisses me and I stop talking.
She's dope starting in the afternoon and all the way to 2:00 a.m.
And I'm with her as long as she wants and she talks and sings like there's no tomorrow
She forgets her stresses and makes me forget mine... and if I get lost, she sets me straight
And sometimes I lie and she believes me, see, I know her treatment now.
How wild she gets... how wild she gets
How wild she gets when she's stoked... and God have mercy on us all when she's pissed off
If she's ever angry with me, I lose my shit and lose sleep until we're OK
And I stay weared out, in a lousy mood and stressed out as I think of her for another couple of nights
And sometimes she drives me insane, and what she says occupies my mind
And what am I to do? See, I fear being embarrassed in front of her.
How wild she gets... how wild she gets
How wild she gets when she's stoked... and God have mercy on us all when she's pissed off
She forgets herself and makes me forget myself...she dances and makes me dance
And sometimes she goes insane and kisses me and I stop talking.
